Package tage.shapes

Class Animation

java.lang.Object
tage.shapes.Animation
public final class Animation extends Object
An Animation describes a sequence of frames that can be applied to an AnimatedSkeleton object. Each frame holds a list of transformations that are applied to each bone.

The number of bones in an animation must match the number of bones in the AnimatedSkeleton. Loading specific Animations is typically handled by the client at runtime to allow manual selection of Animations to be loaded per individual objects.

The game application should not need to interact with this class at all. Instead, it should use the loadAnimation() and playAnimation() tools in AnimationShape.
